Cell.Text: [S] It's as rewarding as it is dangerous. Let's see what I can show you.
[S] I think I can teach you a thing or two.
[S] I think I can teach you a thing or two.
<<Shared>> There's nothing more I can teach you.
<<Shared>> You've already learned all I can teach you.
<<Shared>> You already know all that I know.
Can you train me in Alteration magic?
[S] I can certainly share a bit of what I know.
Can you train me in Alteration magic?
[S] I can certainly share a bit of what I know.
Can you train me in Alteration magic?
<<Shared>> There's nothing more I can teach you.
Can you train me in Alteration magic?
<<Shared>> You've already learned all I can teach you.
Can you train me in Alteration magic?
<<Shared>> You already know all that I know.
Can you train me to Block?
[S] You wish to learn from the best, eh? So be it.
Can you train me to Block?
[S] I can. It might save your life.
Can you train me to Block?
[S] I can. It might save your life.
Can you train me to Block?
<<Shared>> There's nothing more I can teach you.
Can you train me to Block?
<<Shared>> You've already learned all I can teach you.
Can you train me to Block?
<<Shared>> You already know all that I know.
Can you teach me about Conjuration?
[S] You deal with powerful forces. Take care they do not overwhelm you.
Can you teach me about Conjuration?
[S] I'll teach you some of what I know, but be careful.
Can you teach me about Conjuration?
[S] I'll teach you some of what I know, but be careful.
Can you teach me about Conjuration?
<<Shared>> There's nothing more I can teach you.
Can you teach me about Conjuration?
<<Shared>> You've already learned all I can teach you.
Can you teach me about Conjuration?
<<Shared>> You already know all that I know.
I'd like training in Destruction Magic.
[S] I can teach you, but I won't be held responsible for what you do with the knowledge.
I want to train in Destruction Magic.
[S] I can teach you, but I won't be held responsible for what you do with the knowledge.
I want to train in Destruction Magic.
[S] Mind what - or who - you practice this on.
I'd like training in Destruction Magic.
<<Shared>> There's nothing more I can teach you.
I'd like training in Destruction Magic.
<<Shared>> You've already learned all I can teach you.
I'd like training in Destruction Magic.
<<Shared>> You already know all that I know.
Can you train me in Enchanting?
[S] You've come to the right place. I'd be happy to teach you.
Can you train me in Enchanting?
[S] You've come to the right place. I'd be happy to teach you.
Can you train me in Enchanting?
<<Shared>> There's nothing more I can teach you.
Can you train me in Enchanting?
<<Shared>> You've already learned all I can teach you.
Can you train me in Enchanting?
<<Shared>> You already know all that I know.
Can you train me to better use Heavy Armor?
[S] I'll show you what I can about protecting yourself.
Can you train me to better use Heavy Armor?
[S] Use it right, and you won't feel a thing.
I'd like you to train me in Illusion magic.
[S] I shall explain to you the mysteries of the outer realms.
I'd like you to train me in Illusion magic.
[S] Your power over others shall be great, like mine.
I need training in Light Armor.
[S] I'll teach you how to use it effectively, and keep you quick on your feet.
I need training in Light Armor.
[S] I'll teach you how to use it effectively, and keep you quick on your feet.
I need training in Light Armor.
[S] You'll be able to run circles around the big, slow brutes in Heavy Armor.
I need some training in Lockpicking.
[S] All right, but if you get arrested don't blame it on me.
I need some training in Lockpicking.
[S] All right, but if you get arrested don't blame it on me.
Can you train me to be better at Archery?
[S] I'll show you what I know.
Can you train me to be better at Archery?
[S] I'll show you what I know.
Can you train me to be better at Archery?
[S] I'll show you what I know.
I'd like to train in One-Handed weapons.
[S] You'll never compare to me, but I can try and teach you anyway.
I'd like to train in One-Handed weapons.
[S] I can teach you a few things.
I'd like to train in One-Handed weapons.
[S] I can teach you a few things.
Train me to be a better Pickpocket.
[S] Up to no good, are we? I'll teach you, but it'll cost you.
Train me to be a better Pickpocket.
[S] Up to no good, are we? I'll teach you, but it'll cost you.
I'd like training in Restoration magic.
[S] I'll gladly share my knowledge with you.
I'd like training in Restoration magic.
[S] I'll gladly share my knowledge with you.
I'd like training in Restoration magic.
[S] I'll gladly share my knowledge with you.
I need training in Smithing.
[S] It's an honorable craft. I'll show you what I can.
I need training in Smithing.
[S] You wish to do what I do? Very well.
I need training in Smithing.
[S] It's an honorable craft. I'll show you what I can.
Can you train me to Sneak?
[S] Stick with me, and they'll never even know you're there.
Can you train me to Sneak?
[S] I can show you a few things, but anyone asks, and my name never comes up. Understand?
Can you train me to Sneak?
[S] They'll never see you coming.
I'd like training in the art of Speech.
[S] Well, you've come to the right place.
I'd like training in the art of Speech.
[S] Well, you've come to the right place.

I'd like training in the art of Speech.
[S] Well, you've come to the right place.
Can you train me to better use Two-Handed weapons?
[S] It's all in the swing. Let me show you.
